1470980.name: Cepheus Protocol: Project Fenrir
1470980.description:
Project Fenrir will be a regularly updated 3rd Person Shooter that will initially only feature Fenrir VS Infected gameplay. Over time we want to offer more game modes as in our "lore' Fenrir is a mercenary organization that does a vast assortment of military tasks.

At this point in our development we are looking for those that would like to playtest the game behind the scenes and help us improve the game before we consider even releasing it in Early Access.

What we learn and create in Operation Fenrir will be directly ported over to our sibling game Cepheus Protocol.

  • 1 Arcade Time Trial Map
  • 1 Horde Map (Coop)
  • Steam leaderboard Support will be coming before we launch in Steam EA
  • Operators & Weapon Customization (Weapon Attachments allow you to fine tune each weapons performance as you level them up)
1470980.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
